virtualNetworkId.description: The resource ID of an Azure Classic Virtual Network

ipV4Address.description: An IP address in a Virtual Network

name.description: Microsoft.Cache/Redis/sku: determines features and pricing of the cache

family.description: Microsoft.Cache/Redis/sku: along with capacity, determines capacity of the cache

capacity.description: Microsoft.Cache/Redis: along with family, determines capacity of the cache

shardCount.description: Microsoft.Cache/Redis: (only if using clustering) number of shards in the redis cluster

enableNonSslPort.description: Microsoft.Cache/Redis if set to true, enables less secure direct access to redis on port 6379 (WITHOUT SSL tunneling)

virtualNetwork.description: Microsoft.Cache/Redis (optional) the ARM resource ID of a Classic Virtual Network for the redis cache to join

subnet.description: Microsoft.Cache/Redis (required with virtualNetwork) the name of an existing subnet for the redis cache to join

staticIP.description: Microsoft.Cache/Redis (required with virtualNetwork) the static IP address to allocate to the redis cache
